data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Cessation
data.news_body: Pursuant to Reg 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulation 2015 we wish to inform that on completion of the term of 5 (five) consecutive years Dr. Ashwani Kumar Vig ceases to be Independent Director of the company.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for ADJOURNMENT OF BOARD MEETING
data.news_body: IND-SWIFT LABORATORIES LTD.has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 13/02/2025 inter alia to consider and approve Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31 2024. The meeting was scheduled to be held on 12/02/2025 however the meeting could not be conducted due to want of quorum. Therefore the Board Meeting has been adjourned until tomorrow i.e. Thursday 13/02/2025.
